price: 82. Ils creusaient à même les montagnes des maisons où (ils habitaient) en toute quiétude.
arabic: وَكَانُواْ يَنۡحِتُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡجِبَالِ بُيُوتًا ءَامِنِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wakānū yanḥitūna mina al-jibāli buyūtan āminīna
